p: SEO was extracted by hydrodistillation for 8 h. The average yield of SEO was about 0.42% ( v/ w) in this study. In the previous study, the yield of essential oil from dried sunflower head was 0.20% ( w/w) by steam distillation at 100 Â°C for 6 h [ 12]. The essential oil yields from the Carlos and Florom 350 hybrid sunflower heads were found to be 0.12% and 0.13% by hydrodistillation for 2 h, respectively [ 9].
